# Steam SDK

This directory should contain the Steamworks SDK.

## Installation

1. Download the Steamworks SDK from [Steamworks](https://partner.steamgames.com/downloads/steamworks_sdk.zip)
2. Requires a Steam developer account
3. Extract the downloaded SDK to this directory
4. The structure should look like:
   ```
   external/steam/
   ├── public/        # Header files
   ├── lib/           # Library files
   └── readme.md      # This file
   ```

## License

Steamworks SDK is proprietary software by Valve Corporation. Please review their licensing terms and developer agreement before use.
